alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 2:31AM PST until January 05 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Additional snow accumulations of half an inch to 1 inch in the valleys, with up to 6 inches across higher elevations and passes. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Northern Elko County and Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 10 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Higher passes along I-80 such as Emigrant Pass and Pequop Summit, could see an additional 1-2 inches from 4-10am. Along US-50, higher passes and summits such as Austin in Lander County, as well as Pinto Summit in Eureka County; could see an additional 2-3 inches in the same time frame.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northern Elko County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range
